item.title: interesting tech
item.description: Link Description https://landscape.cncf.io/ the CNCF landscape makes me want to cry There is a index which lists all the old sections. The newest is at the top. Jan 2018 Link Description https://github.com/lewish/asciiflow2 and http://asciiflow.com/ ascii art draw tool. https://github.com/benhoyt/goawk awk fully implemented in go and passes ‘the awk test’ Oct 2016 gmx - similar to jmx but for go https://github.
